sentence.Network_cn: 他念音非常准确,是纯粹的巴黎调子.

entry.def: Parisian means belonging or relating to Paris.
A Parisian is a person who comes from Paris.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of Paris or its inhabitants;
